children.value: R.A.D. Routes are currently able to be created, saved, excuted and ran in 3 languages.
You need to have Python 3 installed to run the base R.A.D. Routes Runner, which most many Linux distros have, and MacOS has by default.

For the other languages you will need to have those also installed on their own. Most distrobutions of Linux, and MacOS come pre-installed with Python 3, and Ruby, but you will need to have Node.js already installed, or follow the links below for installation.
